content:
Find the Right Honda Alternator in the UAE — For Garages & Car Owners

Whether you run a workshop, showroom, spare parts shop or you are a Honda owner, EMIRATESCAR operates as a secure, centralized spare parts hub that sources quotes from verified, reputable suppliers across the UAE. We conduct the full price comparison internally and provide the most cost-effective option, ensuring no third-party involvement or direct supplier interactions. Our inventory covers a full range of OEM, aftermarket, refurbished and high-output Honda alternators. We serve Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, Ajman, Ras Al Khaimah and Fujairah with fast delivery, warranty options and bulk pricing tailored for garages and workshops.

Why Choose EMIRATESCAR for Your Honda Alternator Replacement

We deal in a wide range of Honda alternators across models and engine types, backed by trusted UAE suppliers. Whether you need one unit or a bulk order for your garage, you can compare prices, check compatibility and request quotations easily.

  • ✔ Genuine OEM and reliable aftermarket options
  • ✔ Verified suppliers and warranty-backed parts
  • ✔ Bulk order discounts for workshops and spare parts shops

Common Alternator Symptoms — When to Replace It

If your Honda shows electrical issues, don't ignore it. Typical signs include the battery warning light, dim or flickering headlights, slow cranking, frequent battery drain, or electrical accessories failing. Early replacement prevents battery and ECU damage — and saves your time and money.

Models & Engine Coverage (Including K-Series Engines)

We list alternators for all popular Honda models found on UAE roads — Accord, Civic, CR-V, City, HR-V, Odyssey and Pilot — and we specifically support a wide range of K-series and related engine codes used in these models. This makes it easy for both garage buyers and individual owners to find a direct-fit alternator.

  • Popular models: Honda Accord, Civic, CR-V, City, HR-V, Odyssey, Pilot
  • Targeted engine codes: K20A, K20A2, K20, K20C, K20C1 (crate)
  • Targeted engine codes: K24, K24A, K24A1, K24A2, K24A4, K24Z3, K24Z7

Each K-series variant may require a different amperage, mounting bracket or regulator spec — our listings include those details so a mechanic or owner can choose the correct alternator the first time.

Types of Honda Alternators Available in the UAE

We make it easy to choose between OEM reliability and cost-effective aftermarket options. Our marketplace lists brand-new OEM alternators, dependable aftermarket units, refurbished assemblies and high-output alternators for vehicles with added electrical loads.

  • Genuine OEM alternators — exact fit and factory performance
  • Aftermarket alternators — value-focused replacements and popular with workshops
  • Refurbished/reconditioned alternators — economical for older vehicles
  • High-output alternators — for modified cars or heavy-electrical loads

Pricing Guide — What to Expect in the UAE Market

Prices vary by model, engine and condition. Below are approximate ranges that help both visitors budgeting a repair and garages planning inventory purchases.

  • Aftermarket alternator: AED 200 – 450
  • Genuine OEM alternator: AED 450 – 900
  • Premium new alternator: AED 900 – 1,500
  • Used/rebuilt alternator: AED 100 – 250

For K-series engines such as K20A2 or K24A2, prices can skew higher if you need OEM or high-output units. Garages ordering in bulk should ask suppliers for wholesale discounts (typically 5–25% depending on quantity).

Why Workshops & Showrooms Trust Our Platform

UAE garages and showrooms rely on EMIRATESCAR for streamlined procurement: supplier verification, stock visibility, and fast lead times. For engine rebuilds, crate engines (like K20C1 builds) and fleet maintenance, our bulk ordering and pricing tools reduce downtime and improve margins.

Why Honda Owners Choose EMIRATESCAR

Individual owners benefit from easy compatibility checks, clear pricing and delivery across the UAE. If your Honda runs a K-series engine such as K20 or K24Z7, you can quickly find alternators that match your engine’s amps and mounting style.

How to Order Your Honda Alternator Online

Ordering is simple: choose your model and engine, select Alternator under parts, compare OEM and aftermarket listings, and submit an inquiry or request for bulk pricing. Suppliers will contact you via WhatsApp, phone or email with delivery and warranty details.

Buy Honda Alternators in the UAE — Fast, Reliable & Compatible

Whether you’re a garage stocking parts or an owner replacing an alternator on a K-series engine, EMIRATESCAR helps you find the right part with confidence. Contact suppliers today to request a quote, check compatibility for K20A2, K24A2 and other engines, or secure bulk order pricing for your workshop.
